entry.title: TORNADO WATCH, Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:27 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 22 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers or a few thunderstorms beginning early this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High 22 except 13 near Lake Erie. Humidex 27. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
